name: Warlock's Tower
description: A punishing puzzler with elegantly designed levels around one brutal rule - one move equals one life lost.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP3 Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible card (SM 2.0+) with OpenGL 2.1+ support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
